meanings.definition: A device used to breathe in medication through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: My inhaler helps me breathe better when my chest feels tight.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an inhaler for my asthma.
meanings.sent3: I pretended to use an inhaler filled with imaginary superhero powers.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an inhaler for my anxious mind, calming me instantly.
meanings.sent5: The inhaler made a hissing sound as I took a deep breath, feeling the medicine enter my lungs.

meanings.sent1: The inhaler in the experiment breathed in the scent of the flowers.
meanings.sent2: As an inhaler of fresh air, she loved spending time in the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The curious inhaler sniffed every aroma in the kitchen, trying to identify each one.
meanings.sent4: He was an emotional inhaler, absorbing the atmosphere of every room he entered.
meanings.sent5: The inhaler of knowledge eagerly absorbed every word the teacher said, hungry for learning.
